name: Embers of Mirrim
description: To save their world from an alien threat, two proud races must set aside their differences and come together... literally. Embers of Mirrim is an adventure-platformer featuring a mystical creature with the ability to split into light and dark embers, each independently controlled by the analog sticks.

recommended_requirements: Рекомендованные: ОС: Windows 10 | 64-bit OS Процессор: Intel i5 Оперативная память: 8 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: GeForce GTX 1060 DirectX: Версии 10 Место на диске: 2 GB
